alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 8:50AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Sunflower and northeastern Bolivar Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 850 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alligator, or 8 miles northeast of Shelby, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Duncan around 855 AM CDT. Shelby around 925 AM CDT. Mound Bayou and Winstonville around 930 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
